name: Looking up the definition of 'pear'

testSteps.description: Given the user is on the Wikionary home page

rootCause.message: Could not instantiate new WebDriver instance of type class org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxDriver (The path to the driver executable must be set by the webdriver.gecko.driver system property; for more information, see https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver. The latest version can be downloaded from https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver/releases). See below for more details.

The path to the driver executable must be set by the webdriver.gecko.driver system property; for more information, see https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver. The latest version can be downloaded from https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver/releases

children.description: When the user looks up the definition of the word 'pear'
Then they should see the definition 'An edible fruit produced by the pear tree, similar to an apple but elongated towards the stem.'

userStory.narrative:
In order to talk better
As a n English student
I want to look up word definitions
